name: Tiny Cursed House 2: Cold Embrace
description:
Explore a frozen landscape in search for the source of a curse, fight various creatures, grab upgrades, defeat bosses, and collect keystones to break the curse!

  • W / A / S / D : Move left and right, Navigate menus
  • J : Action, Cancel in menus
  • K : Jump, Accept in menus
  • L: Action 2
  • Enter : Items & Maps

Requires Java
Estimated Length: 30-60 Minutes.

A fairly short 2D platformer that I made in 2021. After completing development on the original I would casually make upgrades to my code to make things easier to manage as well as allow for new features such as an inventory. I eventually wanted to put it to the test and create another game fully playable from start to finish.

(PLEASE NOTE: Several areas of the game lacks any kind of background music, this is not a bug.)
